episodes.title: The Basic Facts of the Aum Shinrikyo Cult
episodes.description:
In the cult world, it's hard to not have heard of the Aum Shinrikyo cult, who released sarin gas on  subways in Tokyo, Japan. Maybe you'll learn something new and/or something you didn't know. Welcome to the basic facts of the Aum Shinrikyo cult.

episodes.title: Jesus Army Cult : the Public Hearing
episodes.description:
After the backlash of our Basic Facts About the Jesus Army Cult, we decided to make a video with evidence of the atrocities that took place inside this cult.

The Basic Facts About the Jesus Army Cult: https://youtu.be/NX53jkmSfrg

The summary of allegations given to the Northamptonshire police: https://webarchive.nationalarchives.gov.uk/ukgwa/20221215001923/https://www.iicsa.org.uk/key-documents/25493/view/NNP000029.pdf

The entire transcript of the public hearing: https://webarchive.nationalarchives.gov.uk/ukgwa/20221215011833/https://www.iicsa.org.uk/key-documents/19121/view/public-hearing-transcript-tuesday-19-may.pdf

The entire closure statement: https://jesus.org.uk/about-jfct/jesus-fellowship-closure/

#cultleader #cult #jesusarmychurch #jesusfellowshipchurch #noelstanton #dark #public #truecrime #truecrimecommunity #cultsandextremebeliefs #cultsurvivor #jesusarmy #england

episodes.title: The Basic Facts About the Restoration of the Ten Commandments Cult
episodes.description:
A lesser known tragedy that was worse than Jonestown: welcome to the basic facts of the Restoration of the Ten Commandments cult.

NOTE: There were six leaders that were involved with this group, but with the lack of information on most of them, we decided to cover the main three: Joseph Kibwetere, Credonia Mwerinde and Dominic Kataribabo.

Subscribe for more cult videos!

episodes.title: The Basic Facts About the NXIVM Cult
episodes.description:
Many people have heard about the cult known as NXIVM, but if somehow you haven't, here's a video to get you up to speed on the basic facts about the NXIVM cult.

UPDATE: Allison Mack was released early from prison on July 5, 2023.
Nancy Salzman was released from prison on September 7, 2023 to a halfway house on compassionate release [it's believed to be over a breast cancer concern].
